problems.title: Check If Number Is Divisible By Another
problems.description:
You are given two positive integers a and b. Your task is to check if a is divisible by b.

Input Format:
Two space-separated integers a and b.

Output Format:
Print "YES" if a is divisible by b (a % b == 0), otherwise print "NO".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
10 2

Sample Output
YES

Sample Input
7 3

Sample Output
NO
hintsList: Check if a % b == 0. Be careful with division by zero (though b >= 1 in constraints).
